t: A Psalm of David{H1732}. Bless{H1288}{(H8761)} the LORD{H3068}, O my soul{H5315}: and all that is within{H7130} me, bless his holy{H6944} name{H8034}.
Bless{H1288}{(H8761)} the LORD{H3068}, O my soul{H5315}, and forget{H7911}{(H8799)} not all his benefits{H1576}:
Who forgiveth{H5545}{(H8802)} all thine iniquities{H5771}; who healeth{H7495}{(H8802)} all thy diseases{H8463};
Who redeemeth{H1350}{(H8802)} thy life{H2416} from destruction{H7845}; who crowneth{H5849}{(H8764)} thee with lovingkindness{H2617} and tender mercies{H7356};
Who satisfieth{H7646}{(H8688)} thy mouth{H5716} with good{H2896} things; so that thy youth{H5271} is renewed{H2318}{(H8691)} like the eagle's{H5404}.
The LORD{H3068} executeth{H6213}{(H8802)} righteousness{H6666} and judgment{H4941} for all that are oppressed{H6231}{(H8803)}.
He made known{H3045}{(H8686)} his ways{H1870} unto Moses{H4872}, his acts{H5949} unto the children{H1121} of Israel{H3478}.
The LORD{H3068} is merciful{H7349} and gracious{H2587}, slow{H750} to anger{H639}, and plenteous{H7227} in mercy{H2617}.
He will not always{H5331} chide{H7378}{(H8799)}: neither will he keep{H5201}{(H8799)} his anger for ever{H5769}.
He hath not dealt{H6213}{(H8804)} with us after our sins{H2399}; nor rewarded{H1580}{(H8804)} us according to our iniquities{H5771}.
For as the heaven{H8064} is high above{H1361}{(H8800)} the earth{H776}, so great{H1396}{(H8804)} is his mercy{H2617} toward them that fear{H3373} him.
As far as{H7368}{(H8800)} the east{H4217} is from the west{H4628}, so far hath he removed{H7368}{(H8689)} our transgressions{H6588} from us.
Like as a father{H1} pitieth{H7355}{(H8763)} his children{H1121}, so the LORD{H3068} pitieth{H7355}{(H8765)} them that fear{H3373} him.
For he knoweth{H3045}{(H8804)} our frame{H3336}; he remembereth{H2142}{(H8803)} that we are dust{H6083}.
As for man{H582}, his days{H3117} are as grass{H2682}: as a flower{H6731} of the field{H7704}, so he flourisheth{H6692}{(H8686)}.
For the wind{H7307} passeth over{H5674}{(H8804)} it, and it is gone; and the place{H4725} thereof shall know{H5234}{(H8686)} it no more.
But the mercy{H2617} of the LORD{H3068} is from everlasting{H5769} to{H5704} everlasting{H5769} upon them that fear{H3373} him, and his righteousness{H6666} unto children's{H1121} children{H1121};
To such as keep{H8104}{(H8802)} his covenant{H1285}, and to those that remember{H2142}{(H8802)} his commandments{H6490} to do{H6213}{(H8800)} them.
The LORD{H3068} hath prepared{H3559}{(H8689)} his throne{H3678} in the heavens{H8064}; and his kingdom{H4438} ruleth{H4910}{(H8804)} over all.

Bless{H1288}{(H8761)} the LORD{H3068}, ye his angels{H4397}, that excel{H1368} in strength{H3581}, that do{H6213}{(H8802)} his commandments{H1697}, hearkening{H8085}{(H8800)} unto the voice{H6963} of his word{H1697}.
Bless{H1288}{(H8761)} ye the LORD{H3068}, all ye his hosts{H6635}; ye ministers{H8334}{(H8764)} of his, that do{H6213}{(H8802)} his pleasure{H7522}.
Bless{H1288}{(H8761)} the LORD{H3068}, all his works{H4639} in all places{H4725} of his dominion{H4475}: bless{H1288}{(H8761)} the LORD{H3068}, O my soul{H5315}.
